name: Monsters Mixer Village
description:
*** Monsters Mixer Village, the spookiest, funniest adventure for kids***

Start your adventure, it’s time to create your Monster!
Explore the village in the island of Mr Monsters Mixer. Go around strange buildings, travel
from mountains to sea, find out surprises and funny characters. Play games and activities,
feed the monsters with awkward food and win as many points as you can to make your
monster stronger and stronger and to free monsters’ pet friends from the shop they live in.
Enter Monsters Mixer’s lab and create your monster. Choose the most inspiring ingredients:
EYES, MOUTHS, TEETH and NOSES ; add ANTENNAS, ARMS and LEGS at your choice. Mix all in the Giant Monsters Mixer and.. here it is – YOUR MONSTER IS DONE!
Give your Monster the scariest scream by choosing among the available ones, or even better:
record yours and play with the "...ROOAAR..." of your voice!
Now it’s time to explore the VILLAGE and have fun!

*No third-party advertising and no in-app purchase

Follow us on https://www.facebook.com/MonstersMixer
